plot: As an elderly man struggles with the loss of his wife, he confronts his own own mortality by helping others - one parking meter at a time.
title: Meters
plot_es: As an elderly man struggles with the loss of his wife, he confronts his own own mortality by helping others - one parking meter at a time.
plot_en: As an elderly man struggles with the loss of his wife, he confronts his own own mortality by helping others - one parking meter at a time.
